type1_missing.reasoning: POST /api/auth/logout endpoint is completely missing - no route.ts file exists in src/app/api/auth/logout/ directory, though logout() function exists in auth.ts
Email validation function with regex pattern /^[^\s@]+@[^\s@]+\.[^\s@]+$/ is not implemented anywhere - validation.ts has no validateEmail function
Client-side email format validation on login page is completely absent - no pattern attribute or validation logic for email field
Next.js middleware file does not exist - no middleware.ts or middleware.js in project root to protect /dashboard routes or redirect authenticated users from login/register pages
Empty state message 'No tasks yet. Add your first task above!' is not implemented in TaskList component - component renders nothing when tasks array is empty

type2_incorrect.reasoning: Session cookie name is 'session' instead of specified 'todo-session'
Error response format is { error: "message" } instead of specified nested format { error: { code: "ERROR_CODE", message: "Human-readable message" } }
Bulk operations clearCompletedTasks, deleteAllTasks, and toggleAllTasks do not use db.transaction() wrapper as required - they execute as single statements without transaction atomicity
Responsive design breakpoints not configured to specification - spec requires Mobile (375px) and Desktop (1024px+) but Tailwind uses default breakpoints (640px, 768px, 1024px, 1280px, 1536px)
Dashboard displays hardcoded mock user data ('User', 'user@example.com') instead of fetching actual user information from the API

type3_extraneous.reasoning: CSV export endpoint (GET /api/export) not mentioned in specification's API endpoints section 6
Dark mode CSS variables and theme implementation (lines 29-49) not specified in requirements - specification mentions only standard Tailwind CSS v3 configuration
